attributes.additional_details: logically we have no choice but to issue a vaccine passport. if the government can demand a national lockdown due to the pandemic then this petition has to be taken seriously
attributes.background: we are in a pandemic hoping that all will be better soon. the vaccination should be made law with everybody then issued a vaccine passport. this will make life easier for the travel industry, employment sector and general socialising in restaurants, cinemas etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575297

If you would like the Government to create new restrictions relating to vaccine passports, we could accept a petition about this, but it would need to be clear what restrictions you wanted to be imposed.
